summary.p: 5 fol. on parchment; Shelfmark: Marcel 81; Qurʾānic Text: Q 10:61-10:66, Q 10:77-10:81, Q 10:94-10:96; 5 lines per page; Dimensions: 260 x 175mm; Script style: kūfī D.III.
The fragment Arabe 357 (BNF) may belong to the same manuscript.

This entry was created on the basis of the information made available by Valery V. Polosin (1939-2014), without use of manuscript images. Therefore, the exact distribution of the Qurʾānic passages across the manuscript pages is unknown to us, and all the passages are shown as belonging to fol. 1. The catalogue entry by Polosin contains the following information:
"Marcel 81
5 fol. 175×260 mm (1.49). Support: thin transparent parchment, “wrinkled”, the flesh side is of lighter color than the hair side. Writing material: brown ink.
Collation: fragments of two quires; fol. 1and 3, 4 and 5 are bifolia, fol. 2 is a singleton with a stub.
I: H1F H2F / S F3H;
II: H4F / F5H .

Text layout: 85×155 mm (1.875), 5 lines. Ruling: absent. Script: small-scale D III. Diacritics: one and two long diagonal dashes in green paint over and above the letters; two dashes in the same ink as the main text on fol. 1r. Vocalization: large round dots of red and green color.

Verse markers: for individual verses – golden trefoil (type 2.2.3b) with green dot in the center and three red dotes between the petals; for groups of five verses – golden letter ﻪ (хā) in the text line (fol. 2v, 5v); for groups of 10 verses – round lobed medallion on the margin (type 2.B.I) drawn with gold and colors, with the inscribed number of the verse (ثمنون – fol. 4v).
Defects: lower margins lost (damaged by rodents?); ink has partly peeled off on the flesh sides.
Attached materials: old wrapping (fol. I) consisting of a narrow strip of paper inscribed with the old accession number in red pencil “B. 58”.
Old accession numbers: B. 58 (according to Langlois’ inventory).
Contents:
Fol. 1r–2v. Surah 10, verses 62(61)–67(66). Incipit: [في كتب] مبين * الا ان اولياء الله . Explicit: يدعون من د[ون الله] .
Fol. 3r–4v. Surah 10, verses 78(77)–81(81). Incipit: [قال] موسى أتقولون. Explicit: إنّ الله [لا يصلح] .
Fol. 5r–5v. Surah 10, verses 94(94)–96(96). Incipit: [الكتاب] من قبلك. Explicit: كلمة ربك لا [يؤمنون] .
Other fragments of the same manuscript: Arabe 357(?) (BNF)."
Olga Yastrebova has translated and sometimes corrected the notes of V. Polosin. Corrected passages are marked with ОЯ (O.Ya).
